caption: Pretty good breakfast. Small menu, but the options were good. I highly recommend the Chicken and Waffles. The only downside to my visit was that I never received a refill on my coffee.
Nice hotel, would probably stay at again.  It was affordable downtown lodging
Nice and clean little spot. Our burgers were great! I went back in the morning and had a stellar omelette. Overall great food. The staff were very friendly and tentative as well.

Unfortunately I had one of the worst services I ever had in the US here at the NIX. First, when I was ordering my food, the waiter interrupted and said in a very rude manner, "I don't understand," even though I was speaking normal English. Secondly, during my dining, the waiter never came by to see if I need water or anything. Last but not least, when I finally caught a chance to speak to one of the waiters and asked for my check (because no one was coming to see if I need any service), I had to wait for half an hour to finally get my check. Their coffee and pastry are even not good. I don't know if this is only to the Asian customers. The people sitting next to me, who are white, seemed to have had a normal dining experience.
We came her for breakfast and absolutely blown away. Great service, great food, clean atmosphere! French toast was awesome! I highly recommend
